I'm interested in developing software that is scalable, performant and intuitive. After taking time away from my engineering career to focus on my family, I am looking forward to returning to life as a developer.

I specialize in C/C++, HTML/CSS, Javascript, and Python.

View My Work

Education

I have a Bachelor's and Master's Degree in Computer Engineering

Experience

I worked as a Software Engineer at my last job for 7 years designing, developing and testing software to control multi-threaded embedded systems

Additional Responsibilities

I wrote software requirements, design documents, presented architecture details to customers, and wrote unit and end-to-end tests

Communication

I've written training manuals and given product demos. I also ran the final acceptance tests with customers.
